main.Crop

    Methods in main with parameters of type Crop 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String Farm.addCrop​(Crop c)
    Adds a Crop to the list of this farm's current crops
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.buyCrop​(Farm farm, Crop c)
    Checks if the farmer can afford a Crop, then adds it to the farm's list of crops
    static void UserInterface.chooseCropItem​(Farmer farmer, Crop crop)
    Asks the player to choose water or a CropItem to tend to their chosen crop and performs the action
    void Farmer.giveTo​(Crop crop, CropItem item)
    Gives the crop the item and removes the item from the farmer's inventory
    void Farmer.giveWaterTo​(Crop crop)
    Wrapper method to allow the farmer to water the crop
    void Farm.harvest​(Crop crop)
    Deposits the money earned from harvesting the crop, removes the crop from the farm and resets its statuses
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.harvestCrop​(Farmer farmer, Crop cropToHarvest)
    Calls the Farm method to harvest the crop
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.tendToCrop​(Farmer farmer, Crop crop, CropItem item)
    Calls the Farmer method to give a crop an item
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.waterCrop​(Farmer farmer, Crop c)
    Calls the Farmer method to water a crop
    Method parameters in main with type arguments of type Crop 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.countyFair​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals)
    The player earns a cash prize, scaled to the number of crops and animals on the farm
    static java.lang.String GameEnvironment.drought​(Farmer farmer, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops)
    The player loses half of their growing crops, the exact crops are determined randomly
    static void UserInterface.viewAvailableCrops​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> availableCrops)
    Prints out all of the crops available for the farm
    static void UserInterface.viewCrops​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops, boolean needsIndexes, boolean detailed)
    Prints out all currently owned crops
    static void UserInterface.viewCropsInventory​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> cropsList, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> cropsSet)
    Prints out all currently owned crops with amounts
    static void UserInterface.viewCropsToHarvest​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> ready)
    Prints all the crops that are ready to harvest
